summary: In a small college town, a young girl working on a babysitting job in a rural farm is terrorized throughout the night.
cast: Tina Houtz|Sarah Thompson|Nana Visitor|Jillian Schmitz|Matt Dallas|Linda Neal|Monty Bane|Douglas Rowe|Bruce Thomas|Kristen Dalton|Kai Caster|Brett Claywell|Bill Moseley|Jeff Markey|Cristie Schoen Codd|Scott Spiegel|Miriam Gonzalez
title: Babysitter Wanted
